definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Let me send you our catalog in English.
sentences.chinese: 請拿一本圖書目錄給我看看。

sentences.english: He said the agnostics were also demanding a "more even-handed" bibliography.
sentences.chinese: 他說不可知論者也要求一個“更加公平的”書目。

sentences.english: His list ultimately became church policy.
sentences.chinese: 他所開列的書目最終成爲了教會的政策。

sentences.english: Bibliographical citations also are tightly structured.
sentences.chinese: 書目引用方式亦有其嚴格規範。

sentences.english: Below are downloadable sets of lecture notes and bibliographical references for readings used in conjunction with lectures.
sentences.chinese: 以下爲與本課程相關之可下載的課堂講稿與參考書目。

sentences.english: The sources have been indicated in the bibliographies of the various chapters.
sentences.chinese: 每章中的參考書目指出資料來源。

sentences.english: So it didn't set the canon.
sentences.chinese: 所以它沒有在確定正典書目。

sentences.english: The university library’s own catalog is an obvious place to start a search.
sentences.chinese: 大學圖書館的圖書目錄，顯然是我們搜索的切入點。

sentences.english: Some schools will provide the recommended book list and stipulate the busy book specification.
sentences.chinese: 有的學校會提供推薦書目並規定作業本規格。

sentences.english: Please show me a catalog of your books.
sentences.chinese: 請拿一本圖書目錄給我看看。

sentences.english: Students are allowed to bring class notes, homework solutions, and readings to the exam.
sentences.chinese: 學生可帶課堂筆記，作業解答以及閱讀書目赴考。

sentences.english: And the Greek canon also accepts 4 Maccabees.
sentences.chinese: 希臘語正典書目還有馬卡比四書。

sentences.english: And why not put some more, selected books down in the lobby?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不多放一些精選書目在大廳裏呢？

sentences.english: Hall and brown first define an on-line bibliographic data base as a collection of records .
sentences.chinese: 霍爾和布朗首先把聯機書目數據庫定義爲紀錄集合。

sentences.english: A bibliography of recommended reference texts are listed below the table.
sentences.chinese: 在表下還列出推薦參考書目。

sentences.english: The old librarian illuminated some old books and manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 員迅速地把這些新書登記於圖書目錄。

definition: a series of books/a collection of books
entire book/unabridged book/entire multi-volume work/comprehensive volume
the four book depositories, namely: classics 經|经, history 史, philosophy 子[zi3], belles-lettres 集
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)
